description: Unreal Tournament is an FPS game initially released for Windows in 1998 that pits players against each other with frenetic "King of the Hill" gameplay. The game comes packaged with various resource files that comprise gameplay, including 3D objects ( .T3D files), audio packages ( .UAX files), level maps ( .UNR files), and music packages (UMX files). You can find UMX files packaged with Unreal Tournament in the "Music" folder in the game's installation directory.
